amendment.description: To encourage energy conservation through bicycling.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1391 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1391 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9941-9942; text: CR S9941) To encourage energy conservation through bicycling.
